settings.title: Contact Us
settings.content:
From start to finish, we're here to help. And we might be bragging, but we think our friendly Customer Service team are the best in the business.

So whether you're after advice on bathroom colours or need to know how deliveries work, just get in touch.

By Phone
0330 094 0304

We're open Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm
Our lines are closed during weekends and Bank holidays
settings.row5_col2:
Please note
This is a warehouse for customer collections only and we don't have a showroom.
settings.form_title: Alternatively, fill out our contact form
